DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine two different dose strategy evacetrapib essentially effect body . The study also explore effect low fat meal body absorbs evacetrapib . This study last least 15 week , include screen . Screening require within 28 day prior date first dosing .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evacetrapib Healthy Japanese Participants
DOC.criteria: Overtly healthy Japanese , determined medical history physical examination Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 29.9 kg/m^2 Are reliable willing make available duration study willing follow study procedure Have abnormality 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , opinion investigator , increase risk associate participate study Have abnormal supine blood pressure determine investigator Have history presence cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , hematological , neurological disorder capable significantly alter absorption , metabolism , elimination drug ; constitute risk take study medication ; interfere interpretation data Are woman pregnant lactate Have use intend use overthecounter , prescription medication , herbal medicine 14 day prior enrollment study Have donate blood 400 mL last 12 week ( male ) last 16 week ( female ) , blood donation ( include apheresis ) within last 4 week Have average weekly alcohol intake exceed 21 unit per week ( male ) 14 unit per week ( female ) , unwilling abide alcohol restriction Are participant currently smoke 10 cigarette per day unwilling abide smoke restriction
